The book is also the perfect gift for martial arts enthusiasts, collectors and philosophers who want insight into the mind of Bruce Lee.

This attractive, elegant and pocket-size hardcover guide does not overwhelm, but it is packed with candid Bruce Lee pictures and thoughtful quotes from the personal files of the iconic figure. In each spread, there is an organic relationship between the art and text, which is rarely seen in a Bruce Lee title. Rather than focus solely on the martial artist, Wisdom for the Way draws attention to the entire man.
